title: Bug 37021 - Source path is wrong in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path is wrong in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. To reproduce the issue, please refer to the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/ directory. It's important to note that these tests may produce false positives due to filename checking not being enabled in harness verification of messages. It seems that AJDT omits the filename if it doesn't make sense to AJDT.
OB: The sourcepath in declare warning messages for .class files from injars is displayed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.
SR: Update the declare warning messages to display the correct sourcepath in the form 'app/Main.class' when targeting .class files from injars.
